description.value:
Mutant

Your body has been twisted by unnatural forcesâ€”whether through Warp exposure, radiation, or genetic instability. You bear visible mutations that mark you as an outcast in Imperial society.

Effect: You must roll once on Table 14-3: Mutations (see page 369). If you choose, you may spend 200 xp to select one result from the table (must be a result of lower than 76-00) instead of rolling randomly.

system.benefit: You must roll once on the Mutations table (or spend 200 XP to select one result below 76).

specialAbilities.name: Mutation
specialAbilities.description: Roll once on Table 14-3: Mutations (page 369). You may spend 200 XP to select one result from the table (must be a result of lower than 76-00) instead of rolling randomly.
